text: Choirul Huda (2 June 1979 â€“ 15 October 2017) was an Indonesian professional footballer and civil servant. He was a goalkeeper. Huda died when he bumped into one of his teammates, Ramon Mesquita, which caused him to hurt his chest and jaw, and led to him suffering from a lack of oxygen. ==References== Category:1979 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Indonesian footballers
title: Choirul Huda
